Posts.Content: Mar 16, 2009 01:07AM jodyannie wrote: I had a mammogram in June 08...all clear.  I found a lump myself in Jan 09.  Had breast cancer in 2004, triple negative, lumpectomy, and chemo.  This tumor in the opposite breast has the same pathology.  Still trying to decide which surgery is best...have two doctors giving me opposite opinions....one, another lumpectomy with radiation...the other a mastecomy.  It's been three weeks since my biopsy...don't want this to grow any bigger (It's 1.5 to 1.9 cm)...I'm really bummed to have to start down this road again.  The first tumor was er-;pr-;her2-.  no nodes, stage 1.  I never thought I'd have to go through this again.  Now, I'm worried that I'm not making a decision fast enough and it could grow quickly.   Anyone with thoughts...I'd be glad to hear.  Thanks!
Posts.Title: How fast can a tumor grow? Rosekittyhawk jodyannie
